alert.note: Alert for Cass; Grand Forks; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:49AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Grand Forks, northwestern Cass, northern Traill and Steele Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 449 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hope, or 32 miles northeast of Valley City, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mayville, Hatton, Portland, Golden Lake, Buxton, Reynolds and Hope. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 111 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
